On that note, Tristana can push turrets like crazy at level 2 (E and Q). Give her an empty lane for about 3-4 minutes and say good bye to tier 1 turret. Leaps within a ~4 second cooldown rate, plus the 1 minute Flash cooldown she can get away without taking too much damage. Can build full AD without attack speed because her Q's nearly always up. I don't see a reason to ban her. I also don't see a reason to ban Nid, unless you're a spear magnet then yes. Her leaps might be up nearly every second, and most of the "unviable URF picks" have some form or long-range poke or disengage (like Jayce's Mercury Hammer's E).

And like others have stated, Tanks are still viable in URF. Full MR Leo for example. Her W is a steroid for her Armor and MR, and with it she can clear 400 MR easily with the right items, while her URF 80% CDR pretty much makes it up 24/7 365 while she Q's the living hell out of you. EQW EQW EQW EQW EQW until you just get tired of going to lane from all the cheese.
